items.name: stripe-nextjs
items.description: Stripe payment integration for Next.js App Router with type-safe API routes and webhook handling
items.docs:
Get your Stripe Secret Key from https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys 
 Create a webhook endpoint at https://dashboard.stripe.com/webhooks to get your webhook secret.

items.name: stripe-hono
items.description: Stripe payment integration for Hono backend with unified routes and webhook handling
items.docs:
Get your Stripe API keys from https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys 
 Create a webhook endpoint at https://dashboard.stripe.com/webhooks to get your webhook secret.

items.name: stripe-express
items.description: Stripe payment integration for Express backend with unified routes and webhook handling
items.docs:
Get your Stripe API keys from https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys
Create a webhook endpoint at https://dashboard.stripe.com/webhooks to get your webhook secret
Make sure to read the integration guide completely in `src/routes/paykit.ts` file for the proper setup.

items.name: stripe-nextjs-hooks
items.description: Stripe payment integration for Next.js App Router with React hooks
items.docs: Add the PaykitWrapper to your Next.js layout file to wrap your app in the PaykitProvider.

items.name: stripe-nextjs-prisma
items.description: Stripe payment integration for Next.js App Router with Prisma ORM
items.docs:
Move the content from prisma/schema-payments.prisma to your main schema.prisma file. 
 Run 'npx prisma migrate dev' to create the tables.

items.name: stripe-nextjs-drizzle
items.description: Stripe integration for Next.js with Drizzle ORM schemas for payments and subscriptions
items.docs:
Copy the content from src/db/schema/payments.ts to your own schema.ts file. 
 Run 'drizzle-kit push' to sync with your database.

items.name: stripe-nextjs-typeorm
items.description: Stripe integration for Next.js with TypeORM schemas for payments and subscriptions
items.docs:
Copy the content from src/db/schema/payments.ts to your own schema.ts file. 
 Run 'npx typeorm migration:generate' to create the migrations.

items.name: stripe-nextjs-mongoose
items.description: Stripe integration for Next.js with Mongoose schemas for payments and subscriptions
items.docs: Copy the content from models/payments.ts to your own models/payments.ts file.

items.name: stripe-nextjs-sequelize
items.description: Stripe integration for Next.js with Sequelize schemas for payments and subscriptions
items.docs: Copy the content from src/db/schema/payments.ts to your own schema folder.
